mapper.select: select * from book_order where user_id=#{userId} order by order_num desc

SELECT detail_num, d.order_num, d.item_id, item_cnt, price, title, author, publisher, total_price, cover FROM order_detail d JOIN book b ON d.item_id = b.item_id JOIN book_order o ON d.order_num = o.order_num WHERE d.order_num = #{orderNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO book_order(order_num, user_id, order_addr, order_phone, total_price, request, pay_number, order_name) VALUES (#{orderNum}, #{userId}, #{orderAddr}, #{orderPhone}, #{totalPrice}, #{request}, #{payNumber}, #{orderName})
INSERT INTO order_detail(detail_num, order_num, item_id, item_cnt, price) VALUES (detail_pk_seq.nextval, #{orderNum}, #{itemId}, #{itemCnt}, #{price})
